title: Analysis of Learner Emotional Experiences in Online Learning Environments and Application Strategies in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Online Learning Tools and Fundamental Knowledge in Pedagogy or Leadership
context.additional_context: Learners interested in designing/operating digital learning environments as science sector managers/leaders. Require practical insights for improving corporate training programs

learning_goals: Learners can describe the procedure for collecting emotional data using mixed research methods (surveys and interviews).
Learners can compare differences in emotional experiences across online learning environments (asynchronous/video/face-to-face).
Based on research findings, learners can propose emotion-optimized strategies applicable to science education design within organizations.

resources: Comparative Case Study Materials on Learning Environments

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
